definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: side, corner, chief—pl. cstr. [[אֲחִילֵי]] Ex 24:11; sf. [[אֲחִילֶיהָ]] Is 41:9; —
sides (borders) of earth Is 41:9 (‖[[קחות]]); cf. ´[[ירכתי א]] Je 6:22 etc.

fig. nobles (perh. as  sides, supports, cf. sub [[פִּנּוֹת]]; so Ew Di: but perh. = 0’as.iylun noble—from 0’as.ula be rooted, 0’as.lun root, met. origin, stock—prop. a man having a (known) origin, sprung from an ancient and famous stock; so Ges, cf. Lag:BN 68) Ex 24:11.
